forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 66F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High near 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 64F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High around 65F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 16C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 59F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 52F. WSW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
